description: False Indigo (Baptisia 'Carolina Moonlight') is an amazing plant species with unique features. Its foliage is a lovely bright green with yellow spikes of flowers that bloom in the late spring, providing beautiful contrast to the delicate foliage. This flowering shrub is drought tolerant and can thrive in harsh conditions, such as full sun or partial shade. Its flowers and foliage are both fragrant, making it a great addition to any garden or yard. False Indigo also does not need a lot of maintenance, making it a great choice for those with busy lives. Its natural beauty makes it an eye-catching feature for any landscape.
